detail_desc: Long skirt in airy chiffon with an elasticated waist, high slits in the sides and short jersey underskirt.
Star- and heart-shaped hair clips in metal with a glittery finish. Size approx. 3x3 cm.
Long trousers in softly draping mulberry silk with a high waist with wide elastication and a frill trim at the top. Pockets in the side seams, a low crotch and wide, gently flared legs.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck with ties at the front, and a square neckline at the back. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Flounces around the neckline front and back, and a seam at the waist.
Shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist with wide elastication.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a print motif and flock print on the front.
Fitted, ribbed polo-neck top in an asymmetric cut at the front. Long sleeves with shoulder pads and sewn-in turn-ups.
Short cotton twill skirt with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and visible seams front and back.
Wide, shorter-style top in cotton jersey with cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Jersey-lined joggers in a cotton weave with elasticated ribbing and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, side support, decorative gathers in the sides, and wide adjustable shoulder straps.
Top in soft velour with embroidery on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey with flounces at the top in a broderie anglaise weave.
Short jersey dress in a double layer at the top with narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round metal earrings. Length 4 cm.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and half-string back.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Short dress in chiffon with broderie anglaise and a small frilled collar. V-neck opening with ties at the front, a gathered yoke at the shoulders, long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and a frill trim at the hem. Jersey lining.
Short dress in a patterned weave with a round neckline, long sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Trainers in mesh with rubber details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
Fitted jacket in a linen and viscose weave with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Hi-tops in fabric and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a hook and loop tab at the top. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, and tapered legs.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 9 cm.
Jumper in a cable-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with a slight sheen. Elasticated waist and flared legs.
Straight-style jacquard-knit top in soft dogtooth-patterned jersey with a round neck and 3/4-length sleeves that flare at the cuffs.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in a soft, ribbed cotton blend with short sleeves.
Checked beret in woven fabric containing some wool with imitation leather details. Lined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with buttons and picot trims at the hems.

Suit trousers in a wool and linen weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button, and legs with creases, turn-ups and kick tape at the hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Short, wide shorts in soft jersey made from a modal and viscose blend with an elasticated waist and pockets in the side seams.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees. The jeans are made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.

Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at the waist. Long sleeves with a slit and drawstring at the cuffs, and an asymmetric skirt that is shorter at the front. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Satin dressing gown with concealed ties at the waist and a detachable tie belt. Short, wide sleeves with contrasting colour trims.

Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves. Decorative scalloped edges, a sewn-on bow, and press-studs at the side and crotch. One with an all-over print and one in pointelle.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with embroidery on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Short T-shirt in soft jersey with a trim in a contrasting colour at the neckline and sleeves.

Set with a top and leggings in an organic cotton blend. Longer top in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, front pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits at the front of the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jersey vest top in a soft cotton blend with a print motif on the front and ties at the hem.
Chino shorts in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Short, wide dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves and a seam with pleats at the waist. Unlined.
Round-necked, straight-cut T-shirt in soft premium cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Kaftan dress with a drawstring waist and sewn-together sides with armholes at the top.
Two pairs of metal hoop clip earrings. Diameter approx. 2 cm and 3 cm.
Wide maxi dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back and narrow tie-top shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Sleeveless blouse in linen with a deep V-neck front and back, buttons down the front and a seam at the waist with a flared peplum.
Socks in a soft, fine knit with knee-high shafts.
Cotton deck shoes with lacing details, elasticated lacing at the top, cotton linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Pointed-toe slingbacks with a narrow elastic heel strap, narrow, covered heels and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes on the short sides.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.

Shirt in washed cotton denim with a turn-down collar, classic front with press-stud fastenings, and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and a leather appliqué, long sleeves with press-stud cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cold shoulder dress in jersey with smocking at the top, wide shoulder straps, short sleeves and a flared skirt.
Small elasticated scrunchies in various designs.
Short, sleeveless dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck and shoulder straps that cross with a knot at the back. A-line and slightly longer at the back.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton. T-shirt in slub jersey with a print motif on the front, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Gently rounded and longer at the back. Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Set with a shirt, pair of shorts and a bow tie in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets, a fake back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a slightly deeper neckline.
Gently flared dress in a double layer of embroidered tulle with short flounced sleeves and gathers at the top. Opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Short shorts in a mulberry silk weave. High waist with wide elastication and a small frill trim at the top, and pockets in the side seams.
